website_summaries.verdict: A simple and sturdy little stand that ensures that your pricy Apple Watch is snugly protected when you’re charging it overnight.
pros: Charger displays Apple Watch like a desktop clock
Securely holds your Apple Watch as it charges
cons: This device holds your Apple Watch and official charger in place, but it cannot charge your device without the charger

customer_reviews.title: Orzly Apple Watch Stand is just OK.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both this Orlzly Night Stand and the Spigen one, since I could not decide online. I used this stand for 4 nights. I ended up selecting the Spigen as the keeper for these reasons: the Orzly takes up more space on my night stand, the Orzly required permanent adhesive (included) to stick in place and the Orzly puts a sharp bend in the Watch magnetic charging cable just below the disc. My pictures show the side by side size difference. Product is OK, and not a terrible option, but after side by side use it was not my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. McDonough

customer_reviews.title: and I think that the Spigen dock is actually better than this one - it's much less bulkier and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my second Apple Watch stand, and I'll leave it at my desk at work. I have a Spigen stand that I use at my home-office, and I think that the Spigen dock is actually better than this one - it's much less bulkier and will not crowd your desk as this one does. Also, setting up the cable is a little annoying. Getting the USB to fit through the provided opening without breaking or bending it is a challenge. That's why I'm giving it 3 stars - it does its job, but it's a little bigger than it should. Pic attached shows the size difference between them (Orzly is left, Spigen is right).
customer_reviews.author: Igor Macaubas

customer_reviews.title: 44mm?  I don't think so
customer_reviews.text: Though the construction and appearance of the stand are pleasing, it DOES NOT work with my Apple watch 4, 44mm. No matter how I position the stand/watch/cable, it never is close enough to charge my watch. Occasionally, I've seen that it's makes a connection and starts charging; however, checking on it a few minutes later, I find that it is not charging, and just there as a watch stand. After a month of trying, I gave up and threw it in the garbage. If you have large sized watch, don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: davyboy

customer_reviews.title: Only fits original iwatch charger!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it! Sits the charger at an uncomfortable forced position inside of it. Also, couldn’t use my awesome belkin charger as I was hoping to, because it only fits the oringal iwatch charger that comes with it. So if you have a slightly bigger one like my belkin, then your S.O.L. Which stinks cause my belkin charger was fifty dollars and is of way better material than the original charger the iwatch comes with. Got no use for this stand now unfortunately. Maybe I can use it as a door stopper since it’s got some nice weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ram333

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have an aftermarket leather strap with a deployant buckle on my watch and the only way to charge it was to have it laying face down with the charger on the back. I didn't want to just leave my watch sitting on the crystal for fear of scratching it (I do have the sapphire crystal version, but still) so for a few dollars, I figured this stand would be worth it, and it certainly is. It's well made, the Apple charging cable snapped right in and it holds the watch perfectly. No fear of scratching and in nightstand mode, it's just more convenient. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the Apple charger
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine and my Apple Watch charger doesn’t fit!:( thisbis the charger that came with my Apple Watch and as seen is way too Big to fit:( I have an Apple Watch 3
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Apple Watch 4
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work correctly for Apple Watch 4. The lower lip holds the watch too high resulting in charging error messages. I was able to cut the lip off with scissors and it seems to be working ok.
customer_reviews.author: jc01507

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! This is a good looking, quality watch stand
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this product. And the fact the seller and manufacturer honored a pricing error, shipping this at a lost to the US is worthy of mention as well. Top notch product, and top notch service from Orzly. Wouldn’t hesitate to purchase again. ******************************* I rely heavily on reviews when I make purchases so I put some time into reviewing everything I buy on Amazon for personal or business use so I can help other people considering that item. If you found my review helpful, please consider hitting the "helpful" button below when it asks if the review is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Mike303

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, elegant, effective!
customer_reviews.text: It stays by my bedside - I just slip off my watch and drop it onto the stand to create a great night watch that charges as I sleep. I travel a lot but do not take this with me - it is simple to pack and carry, but I do not want to experiment too much with plugging/unplugging more than 10 times a week :) I attached it to my bedside table with a piece of velcro under the base - and my kittens love to play with it but have not knocked off the watch or damaged anything in the 6 months I have had it. Highly recommended - a nice decor piece that is also very functional!
customer_reviews.author: Mani Akella

customer_reviews.title: Too small a cradle to fit the charger
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money; the orifice in this cradle is too small to fit the charger. I tried a heat gun to soften the hard rubber in an attempt to enlarge the hole without success.
customer_reviews.author: Aristides Restituyo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very very easy to knock the watch off, which is kind of annoying. must put in a VERY secluded area to lessen chance of knocking the entire watch off of the stand, thus not charging, THUS dying on the floor between your nightstand and bed where it will remain for a while out of frustration. otherwise good. i've moved it like, a thousand times and the adhesive is still good as new (very surprising).
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I have experience with a couple of other stands and this one is by far my favorite. It does what it's supposed to do, hold the Apple Watch and charge it. There is nothing special about putting it on the charger, no finicky placements, just set it and charge it. I'm using this with Apple Watch 2 and 4 and not a single issue with either of them placing them into the stand accepting a charge. Update: After using this stand with great success, I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Essential for iWatch
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this would be a silly addition to my iWatch charger. Wow, was I wrong! This thing is absolutely awesome! I've done some traveling over the last couple of months... so I've had a lot of opportunity to appreciate both charging my watch at home with this stand ... and on the road without this stand. Without this stand; your watch can easily get knocked of a table, may get knocked off the charger/stop charging, may not be visible/where you want it when your jet-lagged addled brain is trying to figure out what time it is. With this stand... you have none of those issues. I'm now buying a second one for when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out and functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Low profile so it won’t tip over, has a little easel shelf for the watch to sit on so it’s not dependent on the magnet to hold it in place, heavy enough that it doesn’t get knocked around too easy (could use the adhesive bottom as well but I haven’t tried that yet) and the cord channel is nice and tight so everything fits well. Just got it so I can’t be 100% sure, but it seems like a winner.
customer_reviews.author: cinco11

customer_reviews.title: Very useful item in the Apple watch game
customer_reviews.text: Very useful item in the Apple watch game. Amazon requires too many characters in these transaction reviews. It's no problem, really. I can write nonsense with indefinance. I'm not even sure indefinance is a real word. Anyway, this stand and charger are great. Neither cured my gout, but I expect too much. I'm so stupid! I am sorry you had to read that. Who here's been to Ruby Tuesday? Beatles. Seriously, though. It's a cool accessory that will make your Apple Watch charging easier and this seller is fast, well priced, and just plain nice. I do not think you can beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little thing
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with how sturdy and well made this item is. It seems to be made of a heavy rubber, and is smooth like the common athletic Apple Watch bands. There is an adhesive layer on the underside, although I won’t try using that on my wooden nightstand so I can’t attest to its strength. Even without the adhesive, this stand seems to stay put just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for a bedside clock
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy base for your Apple Watch. I got this one for my girlfriend, but I had one before this for myself. My watch had a large case on it so the base I had needed modification and I needed to use a saw - I used a Dremel since I had one. The cord sits very flush to the base - very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid. Holds watch well while charging. Small enought to travel with easily. I bougth two of these, one for home and one for traveling. I'm glad I did. I did not rate Adhesion because I have not used the adhesive. I prefer not stick adhesive to the bedside table at my home, and I'm using the other one for travel, so I don't want to ahere it to a hotel nightstand. Fortunately, this stand is heavy enough to stay in place adequately without using the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney N. Yerby

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop charger
customer_reviews.text: It's a great desktop charger for my apple watch. I keep it on my desk and just set my watch on it as I'm typing. It's easy to set the standard charger into it and does a great job charging my watch. Tap on the desk near it and it shows the time. I liked it so much I bought a second one to keep on my nightstand, and a third one to gift to a friend who was having problems with the "lay flat" style of the standard charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work the best
customer_reviews.text: I have other similar stands, but this one, although a little larger and heavier Is much better My watch makes good contact and goes right into nightstand mode immediately, no matter which watch band I use. So, spend the extra $2 and get the best one. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Apple Watch Experience is Incomplete Without This
customer_reviews.text: This stand is so useful that I feel Apple should include it with the watch. Charging my watch used to be cumbersome - the cords are short and the watch just flops around when you lay it down, and just gets in the way. I brought this on a whim and it COMPLETELY changed the way I manage my watch. It sits on my nightstand, tucked away, and out of the way. The stand itself itself is great. It feels expensive, it’s got that silicone feel to it, and the packaging was very professional. YOU HAVE TO BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect. It's easy to put the charging cable inside. I'm not using the sticky feature since I want to be able to move the stand around as needed, but it stays in place just fine without sticking it to the surface. It holds up my Apple Watch at just the right angle to use the watch's clock feature. Overall, an excellent product and a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paola V.S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality built and a great price
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very sturdy and has a little shelf / ledge to help hold your watch in place. Comes with tape on the bottom to secure it to a countertop, but it is heavy enough that we do not use it. Your watch charging cord fits into the stand. It works great to charge your watch in night stand mode. Just grab your watch and go when you get out of bed in the mornings! The price can't be beat. We have used this for several months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: RVR

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few days, but it is a great item. The charging pad fits perfectly into the dock and your watch sits comfortably on it as well. The great thing about this is no more just laying your watch on the charger and having it flip around. This works with all watch band types as well. You can’t beat the price of this item and I even had a member of the company email asking if the product was working okay. Great customer service and great product. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, good fit and non slip, after my addition.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I thought this would be. No problems with having to use the adhesive back, and worrying about damaging furniture. Just cut a small piece of the non slip mesh, peel the paper for the adhesive and stick the non slip mesh on the bottom. Perfect fit for only the APPLE WATCH CHARGER, unless the aftermarket charger is exactly the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Rvdan

customer_reviews.title: Turned my fingers black. Permanent adhesive instead of rubber on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Handling this turned my fingers black and after washing them some of it didn't come off. So I have to wonder if this material is going to mark up my watch. It has adhesive on the bottom to stick on the table. Why? Why not a rubber pad? I'm going to have to return this and go with something else. I don't trust it to not scuff up my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Powers

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice and sturdy, but wish the peel-and-stick adhesive was not pre-installed
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of this small, hard rubber stand. The surface finish is matte, giving it a nice soft and grippy feel. I also like that cord retention goes straight out the back. The only thing I did not like is that the adhesive double-backed tape came pre-installed. The backing of the peel-and-stick layer is extremely slippery, so you must either actually use the adhesive or break out the Goo Gone and remove it. Leaving it in place is not a reasonable option if you don't want the stand sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Gilman Wong

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The best product I’ve ever purchased. Prior to buying this, my cord would fall behind the nightstand and get lost. This $8 investment is the Best Buy for the price. It has adhesive on the bottom but is not needed since the weight of the stand is great enough. The concave shape houses the watch perfectly, and the puck never comes loose. Black blends in well. Does collect dust but wipes off easy from the rubber feel it has.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: You just can't beat this for the price. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice watch-stand and saves a fortune over the Apple-branded Apple Watch stand. I bought two of these and was not disappointed. It's very solid, nice look and texture (will protect furniture), stays in place. It holds the watch at a very nice level and position giving it simple dignity compared to just setting the watch on its side on the nightstand. With this device the Apple Watch functions perfectly as the only alarm clock I will ever need. Being stable and sturdy it makes it much quicker and easier to connect your watch for charging. So much bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Fixer-upper

customer_reviews.title: Great dock for the Apple Watch. The reviews speak for itself
customer_reviews.text: Really great stand for the Apple Watch. I have a series 4 44mm in space gray and it compliments the watch when charging really well. There’s also tape on the bottom to help it not move in place. I didn’t use it as I don’t want it to be permanently used so I just put my own tape. The material also feels really great as it feels like the sport band that came with my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute MUST for those with 'heavy' Apple Watch bands.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, and arrived a day early. Nice semi-squishy rubber holds the Apple Watch perfectly. Great for those with a heavy watch/band, like mine. The upright chargers that allow the watch to 'hang' didn't work with my heavy band, as it would always slide off... so this stand is the perfect fix for that. Not only that, but this stand was over HALF the price of other, less impressive stands we saw in stores (including Apple stores). Zero regrets with this stand. It was my third attempt at finding a decent stand, and I finally found the perfect stand -- perfect price; perfect build quality (with nothing that will 'scratch' my watch).
customer_reviews.author: David Good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stand for Applewatch.
customer_reviews.text: this stand is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. the rubber silicone prevents any scratching and it’s heavy enough on it’s in that it doesn’t move around. my boyfriend has tried to talk me into many other charging stations since I got this one and I will not budge on it. And since he’s got a watch now he randomly throws his on my charger instead! It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bear

customer_reviews.title: simple and better than flopping it down on the cabinet while charging
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described....simple and better than flopping it down on the cabinet while charging. It has sticky paper on the bottom to hold it down, but I will never use that because I don't want something stuck to the top of my cabinet. I bought two plus an additional charger plug so I could have a charging station in more than one room. It DOES NOT COME WITH A CHARGER.....its just a rubber form which acts as a stand.
customer_reviews.author: auntiePP

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product and with excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and with excellent quality. I received it very quickly. I bought this product to replace the current product I’m using in the same category and I must say that it definitely does the job better than I ever would’ve thought. Packaging, materials are all top notch and above my exceptions. I found this product by accident and decided to give it a shot and I couldn’t be happier. It’s lightweight and durable. I don’t believe I will be switching products anytime soon. If you’re contemplating on buying this product I’d definitely give it a shot, I don’t think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Love this Apple Watch Stand
customer_reviews.text: I have one on my desk at work and at home, and I find that because it allows me to readily charge and still see the time on the watch face when I am laying in bed, or at my desk, I have become better about charging my Apple Watch. I would suggest getting at least two, if you are forgetful like me and have days when you forget to charge your watch. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Slan

customer_reviews.title: An affordable option for charging that fancy Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the Orzly Compact Stand for a couple of days, so this will only be a brief overview of my first impressions of the product. The stand is made with hard, yet slightly flexible material with ample space to insert your Apple Watch charger. It is pretty straightforward and easy to set up. On the bottom of the stand is 3M adhesive. I have yet to use the adhesive but has been pretty stationary when my Apple watch is resting on it. For anyone on a budget and wants to use their Apple Watch in nightstand mode as an alarm, this is a great option. For the price, it seems to be a steal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brandon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for loop straps that don't unhook - DOESN'T INCLUDE CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic little holder - and normal apple charger tucks into it nicely. I've bought two - for myself and my wife, and both having opted for the velcro watch straps - this is brilliant as it doesn't expect your watch to lie flat for charging, and it is really easy to pop your watch onto the stand at night. It also has enough weight in it that it doesn't fall over. I did miss the fine print on the first one thinking it included a charger - should have realized it didn't being this cheap ;).
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with this simple stand for my watch
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this simple stand for my watch. It makes it much easier to charge my phone with the leather watch band. I have had issue with it sometimes not charging or I just can never remember which side of the disc you are supposed to touch to the back of the watch. Now after a long day, I do not have to think. It just slides on and does it's job. I love the clean simple and sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Goode

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's does the job of a stand, it has a very soft finish. The permanent adhesive on the bottom makes it a sort of a one time use on the place you attach it (and not sure if it would leave a mark depending on the surface if you decide to remove it later on) I would recommend not using it, but again the unpeeled adhesive is slippery; doesn't bother me too much but it should have been just a rubberized non-slip bottom instead of that and I agree with another reviewer that it should come with the adhesive separate as an optional thing.
customer_reviews.author: Vestil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charging stand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little stand for the Watch, no need for aluminum, wood, or anything else. This takes up as little space as the watch would by itself and holds it perfectly for nightstand display. The tape on the bottom would be great for a fixed installation but I just left it as-is and there's no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product. Well designed and manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy base. I returned a base I received as a gift that cost 4X the cost of this stand. This is just a solid watch base, heavy enough to place on my night stand without moving around. There is an adhesive base (sticky tape) on the bottom but I don't think I will even use it. The charging puck and cord snap securely into the base. Very happy--for less than $8 I am considering purchasing a backup to place in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bmcgnh

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this charger. It is small and discrete on my bedside table and takes up so little room. My other charger was odd shaped and large and always in the way. This is made from silicone and fits the charger perfectly. My watch attaches smoothly at night and is ready and charged in the morning. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for those who use their Apple Watch’s alarm feature
customer_reviews.text: Great Apple Watch stand at a good price. I’ve had this stand for a few months now. Since I use the alarm feature on my Apple Watch, this stand is perfect as it changes my display to landscape mode. The ad clearly states it but just to empathize: You only get the stand. You will have to thread your own charging cable. However this is super easy to do. I wholeheartedly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ABIV

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I haven't actually stuck it to anything because I move my stuff around often. I have used this everywhere I go and I love it keeps my watch in one place and I have recommended this product to friends. if I needed a new one I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: nathan J

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, good functionality, easy to use, quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these and zero complaints. The base is heavy enough to not have to use the included sticker (I didn't want to ruin furniture). You simply take your Apple watch USB charger end and thread it through the back of the device, plug in, and charge. Quality seems very good and I like the silicone surface - I do not worry about scratching the watch or the band.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Life, Sunsets, Cats and Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive stand for the apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for watch stands so that my watch isn't just laying on my desk where it can be easily moved or fall off. (It's gotten close too many times) This stand is very minimalist and does the job well. My current charger popped into the stand and has been working well ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just really love this product. It holds my Apple 3 watch securely on my nightstand. Yes, you do put your charging cable in through it but it is stable and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable charging base
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of this charging base. It has a nice weight to it that I didn't expect. I ended up buying a second one for the office due to it's price and quality. I couldn't be happier with a product and I always recommend it when one of my friends gets an Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aric van Iterson

customer_reviews.title: That's okay if you don't have a nice dresser or bed stand
customer_reviews.text: What isn't apparent until you get this product is that the "non-skid" base has an adhesive tape on the bottom. That's okay if you don't have a nice dresser or bed stand, but we are not going to stick adhesives on our expensive wood furniture. Will return for a refund
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different brands because I wasn’t sure which would be better. This was hands down the best one. The other brand didn’t hold my watch up and sometimes wouldn’t charge with the band I use. This one holds it up perfectly, turns on when you get near so you can see the time, and charges perfect every time. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be on my nightstand and hold the Apple watch charger. It does an excellent job for that. I would not buy it for travelling because it is held down by adhesive and the adhesive would surely lose its grip of I pulled it off the nightstand every time I travelled.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Solid weight, good angle, Overall great stand
customer_reviews.text: Reall cool little charger stand for the watch. The limitation of the watch not staying on is Apple's fault, but it's easy enough to reach over in the dark and find it to push the crown for time. Getting the actual charger in is kind of a permanent thing, so you may want to buy a spare for travel if you aren't planning on taking this with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is great - the standard apple watch charger fits perfectly! It's great to be able to use nightstand mode on the watch without accidentally knocking my watch off the charger in the middle of the night. My only complaint is that when it said it had a non-skid base, I didn't understand that it actually comes with a stick-on base. I have an antique nightstand and there's no way I'm going to stick the stand onto that with adhesive. Luckily the stand is heavy enough that it hasn't really made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Well made product, works well with Gen 3 42mm apple watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, sturdy watch stand. I wanted something that i could put on my nightstand to hold my Gen 3 watch in a horizontal position, this definitely fit the bill. the material feels very solid and sturdy. It includes an adhesive tape bottom (which i didnt use). my watch fits on it nicely. I havent experienced any issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Does the job as it is intended
customer_reviews.text: Only concern is the bend that the device places on the charger wire so I do not secure the charger as it should be. Holder keeps my watch where I place it when charging. Without the device, the watch was not secure while charging and did fall off the nightstand. It does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jomalley

customer_reviews.title: watch stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to have with the Apple Watch. I highly recommend and its not expensive. I think you need to advertise more. Its a great item!! I went looking for a stand for my watch and found your product. Some people may not go looking and just put on the counter. Put it out there!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it should do - it stabilizes the watch on the nightstand. It is well built, and it stays put on my nightstand without having to use the (included) tape for mounting. It is unobtrusive and takes no more tabletop space than the watch itself, with the added convenience of keeping the charging cord easily available. Seller shipped very promptly. I ordered on a Friday afternoon and the well-packaged product arrived on Sunday afternoon as scheduled. I am very satisfied with both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit just get your watch secure
customer_reviews.text: The stand is great! Five stars. However it is easy to not get the watch secure against the charger. That is my fault not the stand. Only happens occasionally but that is the only reason it doesn’t get five stars and again it’s operator error.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bare watch without a case or bumper.
customer_reviews.text: This is a molded rubber stand that you put your charger into. Works great as long as you don't have a case or bumper on your watch. The watch will have trouble aligning to the magnetic charger.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Farster

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Works!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my new apple watch 2 and its so simple its hard not to love. It helps keep the cord on the nightstand when not in use and is easy to place the watch onto the stand at night without fear of scratching. The quality feels great and can't imagine needing another watch stand ever. You can't go wrong with this purchase even if you end up buying a more expensive stand later. Would be great for travel too its small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Gort

customer_reviews.title: Works great on 44mm Apple Watch Series 4
customer_reviews.text: Works great on 44mm Apple Watch Series 4. I had one of these for my Gen 0 Apple Watch and sold it thinking it wouldn’t work with the Series 4. Bought it again hoping it would work after trying to use just the white “pick”. It works great. Simple design that makes charging your Apple Watch much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this charger for my apple watch
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly as described. My daughter bought me one that I use at home. I decided to buy an extra for work or travel. It's a great product. Charges great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch stand
customer_reviews.text: The stand is just the right size on my nightstand. The apple charger cord fits perfectly into the stand. I now simply drop the watch into the stand and the magnetic charger which is neatly positioned into the Orzly stand grabs the watch. The watch then lights up as a convient night stand timepiece when you lightly touch the watch. Got two stands for myself and my wife. Great watch stand at a great price. Got the stand I just a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Larryro

customer_reviews.title: The best Apple watch stand I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other charging stands for my Apple watches am I have just bought my 4th Orzyl stand for travel. The stand has a small foot print and is and is much more practial than any other stand includling the cluts that Apple sells for $80.00. I did not like to attach the stand to my furniture with the 3M sticker and solved slippery problem with stick-on feet (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Herm

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Good at what it does, and at a good price. I have one for my home, one for my office, and one in my car (for when I am driving long distances and not using my watch anyways...). It's even stood up to my rambunctious kitten knocking it off the nightstand repeatedly!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey J. Schaller

customer_reviews.title: It works a champ!
customer_reviews.text: The stand works as it is supposed to. There is an adhesive across the bottom of it that I am not so sure about. I like to be able to move my watch holder around as needed and this prevents that. I'll let it go for now. That is the reason for the 4 stars. If it was the coating that allows for some grip but can be rinsed off and made like new the product would be flawless in my opinion. If you want a watch holder that allows for the nightstand mode then this is a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Rossbach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessory, great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this little stand! The silicon is sturdy and a bit sticky (in a good way). I don’t even use the adhesive and it stays put perfectly on my nightstand. Great little buy and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Chenault

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well build sturdy little stand. My Apple Watch and the charger fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aandaco

customer_reviews.title: Great Add-on to Apple Watch charging cable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for my nightstand. The original charging cable fits snuggly into the base. Watch sits snuggly with easy charging connection. Ordered two more for my husband and son to use. Very pleased with a simple solution to holding our watches while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Zack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This makes my life easier
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a must have if you have an Apple watch!!! This is so easy to just take your watch off and rest it in the lip. No arguing with the cord to get it just right to charge the watch. Cleans up my night stand too. I bought a different type of watch stand to travel with, but as it turns out, this will be my travel charger and I'm sending the other one back. It comes with an adhesive on the bottom of the unit, but it's heavy enough that I didn't need to use it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap made poor product did not work properly from the gate and is now in the back of my closet in the junk pile.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G. Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Convenient stand
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive stand works well. I take it with me when traveling and find it reassuring to be able to wake up and see my watch in the middle of the night. I suspect it will last forever, but I might forget it in a hotel somewhere sometime...
customer_reviews.author: CoRo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Not sure if you need something like this for your watch, I wasn’t but now extremely happy that I have this on my nightstand. This helps keep my watch in place and connected to the charger when I’m sleeping. The base has enough weight to stay in place with additional support (I.e. tape). Simple design looks nice in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It is a simple solution with good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It is a simple solution with good quality rubber that stays put. (It also has a sticker on the bottom that I'd rather not use but leaving the covering on that sticker doesn't seem to be bothering me. I might remove the whole thing, or leave it covered.) The Apple Watch charger slips in pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: It Does Well What It Is Designed to Do
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the Apple Watch cable from falling to the floor. Was concerned it might easily break as it seems to be made of ceramic material? This stand protects it from the frequent accidental falls from the tables. I have two, one for my wife and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Savoretti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed by the purchase. The most important part is that charger is not included and that makes this stand just a dumb piece of plastic. Picture/description is not wrong, it is just misleading. Return of the item is not free ($5.99), so it does not make sense to return it either. Bottom of the stand has s sticky, so it either has to be glued on the surface or would slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perematko

customer_reviews.title: This stand works great small but heavy enoughto stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a place to keep my watch next to my bed where I could see it and you wouldn’t follow for all the timer fell off the charger. This stand works great small but heavy enough to stay in place. I could also carry it easily with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Stewart-curley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charging stand for nightstand mode
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It feels solid, and comes with a built-in adhesive for keeping it in place on your nightstand so it doesn't slide around as you set your watch down to charge. The charge cable sits nicely in this stand and it's postponed perfectly so you can put your watch down to charge with no effort. If you're looking for a quality charge stand that supports nightstand mode at a good price, this one is a winner. I use this with a 42mm Apple Watch Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Dad in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great watch stand
customer_reviews.text: This works great for charging my watch. Very simple design and I like have I can see the time easily on its side. The o it draw back is that I didn’t know that it has adhesive on the bottom. I don’t want to stick it to my nightstand. I may try to cut a small piece of rubber to stick to the bottom of it. Otherwise I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging my Apple Watch so easy!
customer_reviews.text: Makes charging my Apple Watch so easy! This is just for the stand. The charging wire/button is sold separately. No more placing the watch just right. This stand makes it so easy to align the charging button with the back of the watch. Plus, when the Apple Watch is set in the stand it can automatically go in night-stand mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Corti

customer_reviews.title: I use as my clock at night.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand! The clock on the phone turns to the side. And all I have to do is move it and I can see the time in the middle of the night. So no like shining in my face at night. Great stand, will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Active8Player

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after the employee at the Apple Store told me this was what he used. It's super easy to setup and so simple in design but very functional. The bottom has a 3m adhesive on it if you'd like to attach it more securely to your nightstand but I find that it has enough weight that it stays in the general area I want it. The watch easily slides over and displays exactly how you want it to in night mode. For the quality, it is a great price. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelligan05

customer_reviews.title: ... Apple Watch owner 50+ years old This is an Awesome product. It looks exactly as it does in ...
customer_reviews.text: This review comes from an Apple Watch owner 50+ years old This is an Awesome product. It looks exactly as it does in the pictures on the Amazon site. It has understated elegance to it. Simple but extremely functional, while at the same time taking up very little space. The Apple Watch sits perfectly and SECURELY in it. It also pitches the watch to the right angle for viewing as clock. Great product , Great Price, Great delivery service. Thanks for surpassing my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It fits nice and tight and even accommodates the cable 90-degree angle ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for charging. You insert the original charging disc that came with your Apple Watch into this base. It fits nice and tight and even accommodates the cable 90-degree angle it takes exiting from the base with space to make the turn without a kink. Rubber coating is nice on the watch metal. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teaman

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every night to charge my watch and have had no problems with it. It's definitely '"a keeper'. One really important thing, for me, is that I have many watch bands some of which are elastic bands and this charger is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This device fits nicely on my night stand and makes it easy to place my Apple Watch on every time. I was tired of having the cord lay on the front of my stand and having to flip it over occasionally to the correct position. The watch would also lay out full length and take up more space than I wanted it to. This stand changes the game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Apple Watch charger stand is small and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I put the charger on my night stand. It’s small, doesn’t take much space. It holds my apple 4 watch with it’sbulky protective cover and makes good contact. I’ll buy a second one to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Phdu

customer_reviews.title: Small, economical
customer_reviews.text: Small, economical, compact, weighted so stable on top of nightstand. (Has attached adhesive pad but haven’t removed “sticky cover” to use it as weighted base stabilizes it w/watch very nicely.). Very pleased with this device
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cradle to charge my Apple Series 2 watch. This one was very reasonably priced and I was concerned it would be of poor quality. It is great! Very sturdy rubber surface. The charging cord fit it perfectly and the watch sits snugly in the right position. I could not be happier with this product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. York

customer_reviews.title: simple solution
customer_reviews.text: compact and easy to use. functional and not fancy. I liked it so much I bought one for another person.
customer_reviews.author: Dae Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black one. The charger fits snugly into the device and it holds and charges the watch perfectly. The stand is heavy enough to not tip over and also includes adhesive tape on the bottom if you want to use that. I'm not using the sticky tape as I haven't had any issued but it's nice that it's there. Nightstand mode looks great when the watch is charging on the stand. Overall this product is awesome and I'd recommend it to everyone with an Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic is best
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this stand for your Apple Watch. It weighs enough to stay out when you remove the watch from the stand. It's small enough to fit on most any bedside stand or table. The watch charger fits snuggly into the stand, and makes using Nightstand Mode very convenient. For the money, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ⚾📚**M€¥@**📚⚾

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and saves space
customer_reviews.text: I hate big watch chargers, and I have very little room to put any sort of dock on my end table. This one was perfect because its small and works well. Good for my purposes. Also the material feels nice, which is odd to say about a dock, but its so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit - Stands Securely
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with my existing watch charger and it holds the watch securely, regardless of which band I have on it. Also with the adhesive, I can secure it to the place where I want it to stay and it won’t move or slide off. Perfect for using nightstand mode on the watch as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed having this. I used to take my watch off in random places when I got home at night but now I put it on the charger and it's in the same place everyday. Also, I bought 3 Extra for friends and family at Christmas! Picture attached shows the watch stand without the watch so you can see how the charger goes through It.
customer_reviews.author: JulietteLMT

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is simple and inexpensive. I didn't opt for using the tape, though like the idea from one other reviewer to use shelf liner. The size is perfect for me. The tilt angle works for Nightstand mode just fine. I can't see that the stand being smaller would matter as the Apple watch with band take more space than that. Maybe with a 38MM Apple watch and Milanese band pulled all the way. But who does that?
customer_reviews.author: Tjp

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this stand and my girlfriend loved it even more
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this stand and my girlfriend loved it even more. I bought it for her bc her watch kept falling off in the middle of the night when the dog or cat would bump into it, but not anymore. Really sturdy and quite solid so that it doesn't budge at all when the cable is hit. I also really like that the seller personally messaged me asking if i liked the product and asked if i could write a review, shows that they really care about their clients and their input. will defiantly purchase again if the needs arise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apple Watch Edition
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One for me and one for my husband. We each have them on our nightstands in our bedroom. They take very little space and are perfect for waking during the night and knowing what is the time. Don't hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Camley Z. Hitti

customer_reviews.title: Simple. No nonsense. Well made. And Cheap. All hallmarks of Apple except that last one.
customer_reviews.text: Items like this beg the question: why would ANYONE spend $40+ on a machined aluminum or cheap carved wood night stand for their Apple Watch when something like this is just as, if not more effective? A piece of double sided 3M VHB Tape on the underside and it stays in one place too! It's perfect, and it's all you need.
customer_reviews.author: CB Adams

customer_reviews.title: If I were asked, I would say buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised and happy when I received this, it works perfect and it looks really nice on my end table. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GARY ELLIS

product_meta.title: Orzly Charging stand for Apple Watch series 5 / series 4 / series 3 / 2 / 1 44mm / 42mm / 40mm/ 38mm - Nightstand mode edition
feature_bullets: Fits ALL Sizes and Models of Apple Watch - Series 4 / Series 3 / Series 2 / Series 1 / etc ((38mm / 42mm / 44mm). Also fits BASIC / SPORT / EDITION models of AppleWatch (2015 models) / AppleWatch 2 (2016 models) / AppleWatch 3 (2017 models) / AppleWatch 4 (2018 models)

Designed to make charging and displaying your Apple Watch as convenient as possible by acting as a nightstand or desk dock stand that keeps your Apple Watch Charger securely in place and keeps your cable tidy (Charger and Cable not supplied)

Made from a durable TPU material, it is sturdy but also lightweight and compact -making it ideal to carry with you on trips or to use in the home or office to keep your watch on display while charging.
Available in a variety of colours to match the Apple Watch Sport bands and a warranty on any manufacturer defects
PLEASE NOTE: The Apple Watch and Grommet Charger shown in images are for illustrative purposes only and are NOT included with this product

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars11,588 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
